column5: Hi Everyone, heading to callendar bay tomorrow and its my first time fishing there this time of year. Any ideas on what i should use or where i should try fishing? Any help is greatly appreciated.  Thanks,  Bing

I haven't fished Callander Bay yet this summer but a worm harness, go-getter, or slow death rig set up off a bottom bouncer will get you some fish. PM me if you want other info. How big is your boat/motor combo? You can take an easy run out to the reefs at Waltonian for some good fishing.
